Row.Text: All right.
Very Well.
Certainly.
Yes.
You must be insane. I will be doing the world a favor by destroying you.
You will pay for your insolence.
Good! Let us settle this like warriors!
It is inevitable that we would come to blows, and now is as good a time as another.
You are soft and vulnerable. Die.
The time has come for your destruction.
You are stronger than I. I congratulate you.
I have failed, and I must pay the price. I await my execution.
With my destruction, nothing now stands in your way. Remember me as you crush your enemies and conquer the world!
Give us what we want or die.
Our continued friendship comes at a price. Here it is.
Agree to our demands or suffer the consequences.
The dead whisper "no" in my ears.
No.
Certainly not.
That's unacceptable.
Of course not.
That's unacceptable.
You cannot be serious!
The proud and warlike Mongol people greet you. Treat us with respect and you may live to see another sunrise.
I am Temujin, master of the steppes and conqueror of cities. You may grovel in terror if you wish.
Greetings. I am Temujin. I hope that you will prove a firm friend or worthy adversary.
Farewell.
Goodbye.
Until we meet again.
Go away now.
That is all.
Our business here is done.
Welcome.
Hello.
Greetings.
Oh, it's you.
Well?
What do you want?
Go on.
Go ahead.
Proceed.
I'm listening.
Yes?
I underestimated you. I shall not do so twice.
Do not waste my time, dog. Improve your offer or go away.
That's not good enough.
You must do better than that.
Almost...
My chiefs would rebel if they saw me giving up our treasure so cheaply. You must do better.
Is that the best you can do?
You're almost there...
"Do not treat me like a fool: I have been trading horses all of my life. You must do better."
Can you do a little better?
That's not quite good enough.
Almost...
Why pay for a thing when we can simply come and take it later? No.
It is good that we are friends or I might be extremely insulted at your petty offer.
"You must be insane to insult me with such an offer. We refuse.
Why not? We can always take it back later if we change our minds.
With pleasure!
That appears to be reasonable. We accept.
You would do well to agree to our very fair and reasonable terms.
Does this trade interest you?"
I recommend that you agree to this trade: I am rarely so generous.
You are a suicidal idiot. Go away.
Do you seek to provoke us into war? Keep trying: you've almost succeeded.
I find your insane bluster amusing, so I will not kill you for your insolence. Begone.
Very well - it will only make your ultimate destruction all the sweeter.
I congratulate you - it takes courage to extort us. We will comply with your demands.
You have us at a disadvantage. I must agree. For now.
I congratulate you on your courage.
You blind idiot. You will regret this.
How foolish of you.
Consider yourself lucky I let you survive.
